blueprint_book.label: Brian's City (v4.1.2)
blueprint_book.description:
Self-Building Mega-Base
https://factorioprints.com/view/-MNZWdWosuqr3vtaC2hD

4.1.0, 4.1.1, 4.1.2:
* Updated malls to use storage chests instead of provider chests to provide better recycling.  (credit: Thec NiqueMan)
* Added Red-Mall Self-Build to "Construction" book.  (credit: Merach)

Completely compatible with SBF v3.X; will just have an extra signal along some edges.
